headline: Top banking stock picks ahead of expected Fed rate cuts
summary: The market is expecting the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at the central bank's September meeting. KBW managing director and head of US bank research, Christopher McGratty, joins Market Catalysts to discuss how to invest in the financial sector (XLF) as banks are positioned to gain from loan growth driven by rate cuts. The analyst also names some of his top stock picks in the space, including JPMorgan (JPM), Bank of America (BAC), Citizens Financial (CFG), and KeyCorp (KEY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
